Entries.DialogueText: ...Come back when you've got something to show me, kid.
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...Come back when you've got something to show me, kid.

Entries.DialogueText: It's a brand new day... come back when you've proven yourself in the caverns.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's a brand new day... come back when you've proven yourself in the caverns.

Entries.DialogueText: That's it for today. You can try again tomorrow, if you're up for it... *snore*...
Entries.DisplayPattern: That's it for today. You can try again tomorrow, if you're up for it... *snore*...

Entries.DialogueText: Submit today's highest egg rating to Gil?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Submit today's highest egg rating to Gil?

Entries.DialogueText: ...{0}? Hahahaha.... okay, kiddo. Here's a little prizey for you... now, go along and play with the other kids.
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...{0}? Hahahaha.... okay, kiddo. Here's a little prizey for you... now, go along and play with the other kids.

Entries.DialogueText: ...{0}? That's not too impressive, but at least you had the gumption to try. Here's a little something.
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...{0}? That's not too impressive, but at least you had the gumption to try. Here's a little something.

Entries.DialogueText: {0}, huh? Not bad, not bad... of course, when I was your age I was doin' twice that. With a Rusty Sword, and no food!
Entries.DisplayPattern: {0}, huh? Not bad, not bad... of course, when I was your age I was doin' twice that. With a Rusty Sword, and no food!

Entries.DialogueText: {0}... that ain't bad at all. That's the kind of number we're looking for in the Adventurer's Guild. Here's your prize.
Entries.DisplayPattern: {0}... that ain't bad at all. That's the kind of number we're looking for in the Adventurer's Guild. Here's your prize.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, Marlon! Get a load of this... an Egg Rating of {0} for the day!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, Marlon! Get a load of this... an Egg Rating of {0} for the day!

Entries.DialogueText: Well, I'll be... We've got a real Calico Egg hunter here!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well, I'll be... We've got a real Calico Egg hunter here!

Entries.DialogueText: You hear a voice in your head: 'It would be dishonorable to submit an egg rating acquired through the use of cheat code software!'
Entries.DisplayPattern: You hear a voice in your head: 'It would be dishonorable to submit an egg rating acquired through the use of cheat code software!'
